long_description: The GCI Outdoor 360 Sports Stool sets up quickly and swivels 360deg, making it a ideal for camping, bird watching, traveling, picnicking and going to sporting events. Comfortable padded seat swivels a full 360deg. Shock-cord construction allows the legs to snap into place for quick set up. Powder-coated aluminum frame supports up to 250 lbs. GCI Outdoor 360 Sports Stool folds up to 3 x 14 in. and fits in the included carry bag with shoulder strap.
short_description: The GCI Outdoor 360 Sports Stool sets up quickly and swivels 360deg, making it a ideal for camping, bird watching, traveling, picnicking and going to sporting events.
